lines: blossoming epidendron , grasping plant . This word is already in old Tamil ( Puram 58 , 2 ; 254,7 ) and it has cognates in other South Indian Dravidian anguages and Tulu . The

blocks.block_text: meaning Grasping Plant suggests that it is derivative of the proto - Dravidian root Kol , to grasp , seize .
